name: Caur
appearance: Spare frame wrapped in resin-stained robes, fingers inked with pulse marks. Hair tied back with a rib-shaving; eyes always measuring.
character: Patient teacher with a practical streak; treats machines as stubborn children and people as delicate machines.
talents: Hearing micro-changes in the Engine's beat
Growing bone lattice that obeys song
flaws: Keeps too many back doors in his designs
Poor gambler with debts of favor
dreams: Unite Covenant and Temple around a shared rite
Create a civic brace the city forgets is bone
secrets: Knows a three-rib chord that opens a water gate
Grew a hidden shelf in the Archive that bends away from certain names
Owes Keth a favor for smuggled resin and fungus during a shortage
